messages.content: When is the Gallaudet University women’s basketball team playing in the NCAA tournament?
The Gallaudet University women’s basketball team will play in the first round of the 2025 NCAA Division III women’s basketball tournament on Friday, March 7 at 7:30 p.m.
Who is Gallaudet University playing against in the NCAA tournament?
Gallaudet University is playing against New York University (NYU) in the first round of the NCAA tournament.
Where is the Gallaudet vs. NYU game being held?
The game is being held on NYU's home court.
How did Gallaudet University qualify for the NCAA tournament?
Gallaudet University received an automatic bid to the NCAA tournament after winning the United East Conference (UEC) championship.
What was Gallaudet's record going into the NCAA tournament?
Gallaudet had an 18-10 record going into the NCAA tournament.
What is NYU's record going into the game against Gallaudet?
NYU has a perfect 25-0 record going into the game against Gallaudet.
Is NYU the defending NCAA Division III champion?
Yes, NYU is the defending NCAA Division III champion.
Can fans watch the Gallaudet vs. NYU game online?
Yes, fans can watch the game’s live broadcast online.
Where can I find the live broadcast of the Gallaudet vs. NYU game?
The live broadcast can be found at https://gonyuathletics.com/sports/2022/8/23/live-broadcasts.aspx.
Who are two key players to watch on Gallaudet’s team?
Two key players to watch on Gallaudet’s team are Cam Lexow (#1) and Raj Guettler (#3).
What honors did Cam Lexow receive?
Cam Lexow received the UEC first team all-conference honor and the UEC Defensive Player of the Year award.
What honor did Raj Guettler receive?
Raj Guettler received the UEC second team all-conference honor.
What is the significance of the UEC championship for Gallaudet?
Winning the UEC championship gave Gallaudet an automatic bid to the NCAA tournament.
What is the Gallaudet women’s basketball team’s nickname?
The Gallaudet women’s basketball team’s nickname is the Bison.
Where can I find more information about Gallaudet’s participation in the NCAA tournament?
More information can be found on the Gallaudet Athletics website: https://gallaudetbison.com/news/2025/3/3/wbb-25-ncaatournament.aspx.
What time is the Gallaudet vs. NYU game scheduled to start?
The game is scheduled to start at 7:30 p.m.
What conference did Gallaudet win to qualify for the NCAA tournament?
Gallaudet won the United East Conference (UEC) championship.
How did Gallaudet win the UEC championship game?
Gallaudet won the UEC championship game in overtime.
What is the date of the Gallaudet vs. NYU game?
The game is on Friday, March 7, 2025.
What is the significance of Cam Lexow's UEC Defensive Player of the Year award?
The UEC Defensive Player of the Year award is a major honor recognizing Cam Lexow's defensive skills.
What did President Trump say about Elon Musk in his speech to Congress?
President Trump praised Elon Musk and his DOGE team for cutting government spending and firing many federal employees, stating that their work will help the economy.
Who was escorted out during Trump's speech to Congress?

Rep. Al Green (D-Texas) was escorted out by the sergeant-at-arms after he stood up and heckled President Trump, expressing disagreement with Trump's claim that his 2024 election victory was a 'mandate' from America.
What did Trump promise regarding egg prices?
Trump promised to work hard to bring egg prices back down, blaming former President Biden for the high egg prices.
What did Trump say about tariffs in his speech?
Trump said his tariffs against China, Canada, and Mexico are intended to protect American jobs and to make America rich again.
What did Trump say about the Panama Canal and Greenland?
Trump mentioned that he wants to reclaim the Panama Canal and possibly acquire Greenland for national security reasons.
What designation did Trump give to Mexican drug cartels?
Trump designated Mexican drug cartels as foreign terrorist organizations.
Who was made an honorary member of the U.S. Secret Service during Trump's speech?
A 13-year-old boy named Devarjaye 'DJ' Daniel, who was diagnosed with brain cancer in 2018, was made an honorary member of the U.S. Secret Service.
What was the Supreme Court's decision regarding Trump's request to freeze foreign aid?
The Supreme Court ruled 5-4 against the Trump administration's request to keep about 2 billion dollars in foreign aid funds frozen.
What did the Supreme Court say about the release of foreign aid funds?
The Supreme Court said the money should be released but did not specify when, allowing the White House to continue disputing the issue in lower courts.
What is the status of tariffs on cars from Mexico and Canada?
The White House announced a one-month delay on tariffs for automobiles coming through Mexico and Canada after discussions with the Big Three auto dealers.
What did the White House say about the one-month delay on car tariffs?
The White House stated that the companies should use the one-month delay to shift production to the U.S.
What is the current tariff rate on other Canadian and Mexican goods?
There is a 25% tariff in place on other Canadian and Mexican goods.
What did Ukraine report about the recent Russian attacks?
Ukraine reported that Russia launched 181 attack drones and missiles across the country, but most were either shot down or missed their marks.
What action did the U.S. take regarding aid to Ukraine?
The U.S. froze all aid to Ukraine on Monday night.
What did the CIA announce about intelligence sharing with Ukraine?
The CIA announced it has paused sharing intelligence with Ukraine, including U.S. satellite imagery.
What did French President Macron say about Europe's defense?
French President Macron said Europe must be prepared to defend Ukraine without U.S. assistance and warned that Russia may not stop at Ukraine, posing a threat to France and Europe.
What happened to Rep. Sylvester Turner?
Rep. Sylvester Turner (D-Texas) unexpectedly passed away at the age of 70 after experiencing a medical emergency.
What was Rep. Sylvester Turner's last public action?
Rep. Sylvester Turner's last post on X showed that he brought a guest, a mother of a daughter with a rare genetic disorder, to President Trump's address to advocate against cuts to Medicaid.
What did Ontario's Premier Doug Ford threaten in response to U.S. tariffs?
Ontario's Premier Doug Ford threatened to impose a 25% surcharge on electricity provided to New York, Michigan, and Minnesota in response to President Trump's tariffs on Canada.
What did Doug Ford say about the potential electricity surcharge?
Doug Ford said he desires to work with the U.S. for a better future but would cut off electricity completely in a worst-case scenario.
What event did the USDSSA recently host?
The USDSSA recently hosted a Deaf Winterfest event from Feb. 24 to March 2 in Breckenridge, Colorado.
How many people attended the Deaf Winterfest in Breckenridge?
About 200 people attended the Deaf Winterfest in Breckenridge.
How does the USDSSA choose Winterfest locations?
The members decide what they prefer and hold votes. They try to be fair by switching between the West and the East.
Who is Keith Doane?
Keith Doane is the USDSSA Ski Leader.
Can you provide some history about the USDSSA?
The USDSSA was founded in 1968 and has been hosting biannual conferences since then. This is the 23rd Deaf Winterfest.
What was the largest deaf gathering hosted by USDSSA?
The largest deaf gathering hosted by USDSSA was in Telluride in 2006, with 350 people attending.
Who is Jason Yeh?
Jason Yeh is the Vice President of the USDSSA.
What is a fun fact about the USDSSA?
A fun fact is that the USDSSA is one of the first organizations that affiliated with the US Deaf Sports Federation, formerly known as the AAD.
What special moment occurred during the 2023 Winterfest event?
A brief moment of silence was held in honor of Wes Whalen, a longtime USDSSA member who tragically passed away during the event.
Where is the next Winterfest likely to be held?
The next Winterfest is likely to be held in the Northeast next year.
What are the USDSSA's plans for the Winter Deaflympics?
The USDSSA is looking forward to sending their athletes to the next Winter Deaflympics in 2027 in Austria.
Where can I follow the USDSSA on social media?
You can follow the USDSSA on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/usdeafskiandsnowboard/ and on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/usdeafskiandsnowboard/.
How often does the USDSSA host conferences?
The USDSSA hosts biannual conferences.
What is the significance of the 2023 Winterfest for young people?
The 2023 Winterfest had a lot of young people attending, indicating growing interest and participation among the younger generation.
What is the USDSSA's affiliation with the US Deaf Sports Federation?
The USDSSA is one of the first organizations to affiliate with the US Deaf Sports Federation, which was formerly known as the AAD.
What is the USDSSA's Instagram handle?
The USDSSA's Instagram handle is @usdeafskiandsnowboard.
What is the USDSSA's Facebook page?
The USDSSA's Facebook page is https://www.facebook.com/usdeafskiandsnowboard/.
What was the attendance at the 2023 Winterfest compared to the largest gathering?
The 2023 Winterfest had about 200 attendees, while the largest gathering in Telluride 2006 had 350 attendees.
What is the USDSSA's plan for future Winterfests?
The USDSSA is working on announcing their next Winterfest, likely to be in the Northeast, and encourages people to follow their social media for updates.
What tribute was paid to Wes Whalen during the Winterfest?
A brief moment of silence was held in honor of Wes Whalen, a longtime USDSSA member who passed away during the event.
